#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
       int T,N,temp;
       int mod;
       
       scanf("%d",&T);
       
       while(T--)
       {
          scanf("%d",&N);
          temp = N;
          mod = 0;
          while(temp!=0)
           {
              mod += (temp%10);
              temp/=10;
           }
           printf("%d\n", N%mod);
       }
       
       return 0;
       }
